content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC silver.usp_silver_calender
AS
BEGIN

    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.calender') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calender;

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calender
        WITH
        (
            LOCATION = 'silver/calender',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
    AS
    SELECT
        *
    FROM bronze.calender;

END;
